description: A heavily fortified Marine base built into a rock formation on Navarone Island. Known as the Marine Grand Line Eighth Branch, G-8 features 108 cannons and serves as a major military installation. The base has a 'peace crazy' culture where Marines take pride in their domestic operations as much as military readiness.

keyEvents.title: Going Merry Falls into G-8 Base
keyEvents.description: The Going Merry crashes from the sky directly into the heavily fortified G-8 Marine Base, trapping the Straw Hats inside enemy territory.
keyEvents.significance: This unexpected arrival sets up the entire G-8 Arc where the crew must escape from inside a fully operational Marine fortress.

keyEvents.title: Marines Sound Emergency Alert
keyEvents.description: The Marines at G-8 sound the alarm as they detect the Going Merry crashing inside their fortress.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes G-8 as a well-organized military installation with rapid response capabilities.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Scattered Throughout Base
keyEvents.description: The massive size and complex layout of G-8 Base causes the Straw Hat crew members to become separated in different areas.
keyEvents.significance: The base's scale and complexity become a character in itself, creating the maze-like challenge the crew must navigate.

description: An anime-only island in Paradise that houses the Marine Base G-8. The island serves as the setting for the G-8 Arc, where the Straw Hat Pirates must escape from the Marine fortress.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Arrive at Navarone Island
keyEvents.description: After falling from Skypiea, the Straw Hats and the Going Merry crash land on Navarone Island, specifically inside the G-8 Marine Base.
keyEvents.significance: The Straw Hats' arrival at this anime-only location begins the highly-regarded G-8 filler arc.
